title: GUN RIGHTS GROUP THANKS HILLARY CLINTON FOR ENERGIZING GUN OWNERS -
content: “Thanks to all of her anti-gun-rights statements, Hillary Clinton will guarantee that gun owners will exercise their voting rights next November,” said CCRKBA Chairman Alan Gottlieb. “She seems eager to double down on Barack Obama’s failed attempts to stick pins in gun owners.” Source: GUN RIGHTS GROUP THANKS HILLARY CLINTON FOR ENERGIZING GUN OWNERS
